name: Routine (itch) (Jammin'!)
description:
We proudly present you our game ! It’s a game where the character is stuck in a routine. Every day is worse than the precedent. His only way to get out is to call Mary, but he can’t do it. Maybe if he keeps trying ?

Honestly, the game is far from being finish. But we think that he has great potential and that we can do a lot more after the jam.

Controls and explanations : Arrows to move, A and E keys for interactions. Every loop you have to do tasks. One of them is “Call Mary”. You have to try five time to call Mary to unlock the end. After a few loops, the character is so depressed that he want to kill himself with everything he can find.
